isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9200, 9300, 9400 Models Built After January 1, 1995 - ELECTRICAL TROUBLESHOOTING LIGHT SYSTEMS - OPERATION

svcproc.title: BACK-UP LIGHTS
svcproc.para: When the ignition switch is in the (ignition position), the ignition relay energizes and power is supplied to fuse F4-C. When the truck transmission is placed into reverse, the back-up light switch closes and power flows to the back-up lights. Power flows from fuse F4-C through circuit 71, back-up switch (94), circuit 71A, the left and right back-up lights, and ground circuit 11-GV.
